body_html:
@shamanDevel Happy to hear it was a "learning experience" :-) Thanks for all your hard work! I like your suggestion for adding complex support. I think we should probably clean up the existing interfaces to return real singular values instead of the ugly casting. This might require renaming the kernels (adding V2 suffix for the new version) for backwards compatibility.
@tensorflow-jenkins test this please

body:
@shamanDevel Happy to hear it was a "learning experience" :-) Thanks for all your hard work! I like your suggestion for adding complex support. I think we should probably clean up the existing interfaces to return real singular values instead of the ugly casting. This might require renaming the kernels (adding V2 suffix for the new version) for backwards compatibility. 
@tensorflow-jenkins test this please
